nodes.text: Donal's brother and his family owned a farm near the town of Jiguuna on the planet Nal Hutta during the Cold War. The man and his family were killed by the Fa'athra gang after they were unable to pay protection money, and the criminals took over the farm as their base until an individual hired by Donal attacked the farm. The individual also retrieved a lockbox of valuables from the farm, which Donal gave as payment.
